Html:
Hi All,

I've submitted patch 8212 with some improvements to the test harness and a fix to a failing test.

However, I can see on the Patches page that there are patches that have been pending since June 2009.

Are patches being accepted for this project?  I get the feeling that the project is still alive (last checkin was only a few weeks ago) but the patches seem to be ignored :-(

Yours,
Duncan Bayne

Certainly doesn't seem to be very actively maintained.  

Too bad - seems to be a fair number of bugs/fixes pending for extended periods of time.

It's a useful project but definitely needs some attention.
